channel.title: Freeman's mind.
channel.description:
I read somewhere that Ross Scott was going to make a Freemans mind but for Black Mesa. I'm not really sure if this is true but does anyone know?
If it is, I hope he doesn't just put the original audio on top of new footage.
Looking forward to it!

item.title: Freeman's mind.
item.dc:creator: Shasta
item.description:
Haruko:

I read somewhere that Ross Scott was going to make a Freemans mind but for Black Mesa.

Please try and do something for yourself. It took all of about 6 seconds to get the answer, from his own website, on his own FAQ:

Q: Will you switch over to Black Mesa for Freeman’s Mind once it comes out?

A: Maybe. I’m undecided, that might be a good transition for after Freeman blacks out.

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman's mind.
item.dc:creator: JohnKiller118
item.description:
danielsangeo:

Freeman: “Hay! The exit! About time. I’ll just go and–”
HECU: “Get him!”
Freeman: “Whut?” WHAMBLACKOUT*
HECU: “Where are we taking this Freeman guy?”
Freeman (slurring, overlapping HECU): “I…I don’t want to go to school…”
HECU: “What the hell for? We got 'im. Let’s kill him now.”
Freeman: “What? I say we kill him. Kill who?”
HECU: “What body? Huh huh huh huh.”
blackout
Freeman (waking up in Black Mesa graphics): “I shouldn’t have had that beer. What’s going on? Where’m I? Everything seems so…clearer now. Hangover’s aren’t supposed to do that. This is freaking me out. Feels like the walls are closin’ in…”

Read full topic

item.title: Freeman's mind.
item.dc:creator: Neon_Impulse
item.description:
he’ll probably keep using half-life for now even when BM’s released, but he says that after freeman blacks out, it’d make a nice transition.

Read full topic
